docs.snippet: Brazil's players looked emotionally and physically spent after a tense win over Chile and their psychological state is a major concern ahead of another demanding World Cup clash against Colombia, former players and analysts said on Sunday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil's players looked emotionally and physically spent after a tense win over Chile and their psychological state is a major concern ahead of another demanding World Cup clash against Colombia, former players and analysts said on Sunday.

headline.main: Host Role Takes Toll on Brazil as Nerves Begin to Fray
headline.print_headline: Host Role Takes Toll on Brazil as Nerves Begin to Fray

docs.snippet: Keylor Navas knocked away a shot by Theofanis Gekas to help Costa Rica prevail on penalty kicks after Greece had tied the game in added time.
docs.lead_paragraph: Keylor Navas knocked away a shot by Theofanis Gekas to help Costa Rica prevail on penalty kicks after Greece had tied the game in added time.
docs.abstract: Costa Rica defeats Greece, 5-3, in penalty shootout after a 1-1 tie in World Cup Round of 16.

headline.main: With a Lunge and a Parry, a Goalkeeper Helps Costa Rica Advance
headline.print_headline: With a Lunge and a Parry, a Goalkeeper Helps Costa Rica Advance

docs.snippet: Long ridiculed with terms such as “chicken man” and “lettuce hands,” Brazilian goalkeepers received a huge boost when Júlio César helped propel his team past Chile and into the World Cup quarterfinals.
docs.lead_paragraph: Long ridiculed with terms such as “chicken man” and “lettuce hands,” Brazilian goalkeepers received a huge boost when Júlio César helped propel his team past Chile and into the World Cup quarterfinals.
docs.abstract: Brazil's goalkeeper Julio Cesar helps propel team past Chile and into the World Cup quarterfinals, giving a huge boost to Brazilian goalkeepers, who are often held in low esteem.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: With Júlio César’s Help, More Respect for Brazilians in Net
headline.main: For Goalkeepers in Brazil, Catching Grief Is Part of the Job

docs.snippet: Here’s what you need to know to start your day.
docs.lead_paragraph: Here’s what you need to know to start your day.

byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and ADEEL HASSAN

docs.snippet: Uruguay's famously casual President Jose Mujica has tossed some earthy epithets at FIFA over its four-month ban of Luis Suarez.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay's famously casual President Jose Mujica has tossed some earthy epithets at FIFA over its four-month ban of Luis Suarez.

headline.main: Uruguay President Blasts FIFA Ban as 'Fascist'
headline.print_headline: Uruguay President Blasts FIFA Ban as 'Fascist'

docs.snippet: Uruguay's incensed President Jose Mujica has lambasted FIFA bosses as "sons of bitches" who meted out "fascist" treatment to striker Luis Suarez for biting an Italian defender at the World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay's incensed President Jose Mujica has lambasted FIFA bosses as "sons of bitches" who meted out "fascist" treatment to striker Luis Suarez for biting an Italian defender at the World Cup.

headline.main: Uruguay President Insults FIFA Over Suarez
headline.print_headline: Uruguay President Insults FIFA Over Suarez

docs.snippet: Organization, preparation and desire - it may be a simple mantra, but it has taken Costa Rica from unfancied underdogs to World Cup dark horses who are within one more upset of the semi-finals.
docs.lead_paragraph: Organization, preparation and desire - it may be a simple mantra, but it has taken Costa Rica from unfancied underdogs to World Cup dark horses who are within one more upset of the semi-finals.

headline.main: Meticulous Pinto Plots Costa Rica's Netherlands Plan
headline.print_headline: Meticulous Pinto Plots Costa Rica's Netherlands Plan

docs.snippet: Uruguay's star striker Luis Suarez always had a temper when things did not go well on the pitch but coaches, relatives and neighbors remember him as a happy kid in no way destined to be hit with a record World Cup ban for biting another player.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay's star striker Luis Suarez always had a temper when things did not go well on the pitch but coaches, relatives and neighbors remember him as a happy kid in no way destined to be hit with a record World Cup ban for biting another player.

headline.main: As a Kid, Uruguay's Suarez Had a Temper but Not a Biter
headline.print_headline: As a Kid, Uruguay's Suarez Had a Temper but Not a Biter

docs.snippet: After a few days of reflection, Luis Suarez acknowledged what millions saw on TV — he did bite an opponent during a game at the World Cup. In addition, he said he's sorry about it, and promised it will never happen again.
docs.lead_paragraph: After a few days of reflection, Luis Suarez acknowledged what millions saw on TV — he did bite an opponent during a game at the World Cup. In addition, he said he's sorry about it, and promised it will never happen again.

headline.main: Suarez Apologizes for Biting Opponent at World Cup
headline.print_headline: Suarez Apologizes for Biting Opponent at World Cup

docs.snippet: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez has finally apologized for biting Italy defender Giorgio Chiellini during a World Cup match and vowed there would never be a repeat of the incident.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez has finally apologized for biting Italy defender Giorgio Chiellini during a World Cup match and vowed there would never be a repeat of the incident.

headline.main: Soccer-Suarez Issues Apology to Chiellini for Bite
headline.print_headline: Soccer-Suarez Issues Apology to Chiellini for Bite
